modules.name: Pick6
modules.description: 8-step finger-pickin' trigger sequencer (1:6 patterned switch), with optional 'Smart Riff' functionality.

modules.name: Pick6p
modules.description: Custom pattern programmer for Pick6 (as a right-side expander).

modules.name: Rhythm1101
modules.description: 16-step drum-oriented trigger sequencer with preset grooves.

modules.name: Merc8or
modules.description: Quickly remap, scale, and/or invert one range of polyphonic CV values to another.

modules.name: Pul5es
modules.description: Outputs a trigger pulse upon receiving a specified number of incoming pulses.

modules.name: CFor2N2ForC
modules.description: Output a configurable CV and/or trigger across a 1V/Oct semitone CV input.

modules.name: MOREc8or
modules.description: Expands Merc8or's abilities with creative tools and CV control of output range.

modules.name: CRBVi
modules.description: Two-Dimensional performance instrument with on-screen note guides, selectable octave range, optional note snapping, and Y-axis curve shapes. Can also function as a playable VCA. Virtual re-interpretation of Wygonium C|RB hardware ribbon controller.
